title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Nov 19 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Nov 19 2021
description:
Kyle Rittenhouse not guilty on all counts. C&B give live Rittenhouse verdict commentary. Buck says justice survived in America and that self-defense is real. Makes Clay feel good to be a lawyer and he thanks the jury for not being swayed by lies -- or the president. Friday Friend, Alex Berenson, returns to the show to talk about the media covid lies, a new Pfizer pill that will end covid. Fauci will never admit that he was wrong. The dumbest mayor in the country gives his opinion on the Rittenhouse verdict. Don't forget how the left defamed Kyle Rittenhouse.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
